actions.committee: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to amend the Workforce Investment Act of 1998 to authorize additional funding for on-the-job training.

summary.text: On-the-Job Training Act of 2010 - Amends the Workforce Investment Act of 1998 to authorize the Secretary of Labor to: (1) make discretionary grants to local areas for adult on-the-job training or dislocated worker on-the-job training; and (2) use up to 10% of funds authorized under this Act to make grants to states, local boards, and federally recognized tribal organizations for developing on-the-job training programs.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Workforce Investment Act of 1998 to authorize additional funding for on-the-job training.
